CFM_Dog.synopsis: The player hears an uproar in the camp and  think the owlbear’s turned on Scratch. When they investigate, they discover the cub is having a nightmare and the dog is comforting him. The player can talk to them and confirm that there's no danger. Subsequently, the cub will be a permanent feature in the camp, with new behaviours with Scratch, plus a new default dialogue.Note: if the player decides to not investigate the sounds, the animals will be moved off-stage for the remainder of the night/the sounds will stop, The player won't know what happened until they see the animals again. If they have SwA, they can learn that there was nothing wrong.
CFM_Dog.how_to_trigger: Repro steps:1. Start the game2. loadlevel WLD_Main_A3. oe qnight NIGHT_OwlbearCubDog_902e10f8-e9d8-4eb6-ac0f-9ad8ba8787ed4. End the day and go to camp5. Go to sleep, the dialog will start

CFM_Dog_4.context: CinematicNodeContext: The loud shriek of the owlbear cub is suddenly heard, a short distance away in the darkness, followed by the soft whine of Scratch (both offscreen). The player turns and looks at the darkness in surprise/alarrm

CFM_Dog_21.context: CinematicNodeContext: The player moves towards the violent-sounding animal noises, coming from off-screen.

CFM_Dog_34.context: CinematicNodeContext: The player arrives at the source of the noise and holds up.Reveal of the owlbear cub and Scratch lying together. The cub is asleep and having a bad dream. He growls and hoots aggressively in his sleep while Scratch lies next to him and howls softly to comfort the cub.

CFM_Dog_16.speaker: Player
CFM_Dog_16.text: What's going on? I thought something was wrong.

CFM_Dog_19.context: CinematicNodeContext: Scratch spots the player and stands, wagging his tail. The owlbear cub blinks awake and gets up.

CFM_Dog_18.speaker: Scratch
CFM_Dog_18.text: Just a bad dream. It's all right.

CFM_Dog_11.speaker: Owlbear Cub
CFM_Dog_11.text: Goblins had me in a cage. Poked me with pointy sticks..
CFM_Dog_11.context: NodeContext: A little shaken. Still lingering on the dream he was having. (Sentence fragments intentional for the cub)

CFM_Dog_46.speaker: Scratch
CFM_Dog_46.text: Hush now, it was just a nightmare. We're safe here, with our guardian.
CFM_Dog_46.context: CinematicNodeContext: Addressed to owlbear cubNodeContext: Reassuring

CFM_Dog_47.speaker: Scratch
CFM_Dog_47.text: He'll settle in. Give it a little time.
CFM_Dog_47.context: CinematicNodeContext: Addressed to the player, referring to the owlbear cub

CFM_Dog_9.speaker: Player
CFM_Dog_9.text: You two looked cosy together. Bad dreams aside.

CFM_Dog_8.speaker: Scratch
CFM_Dog_8.text: He's still young. I remember Gomwick would let me sleep under his cloak when I was a pup. It helps.

CFM_Dog_36.speaker: Player
CFM_Dog_36.text: All right then, so long as nobody's getting hurt.

CFM_Dog_0.speaker: Owlbear Cub
CFM_Dog_0.context: NodeContext: Horrified at the thought. (Sentence fragments intentional for the cub)

CFM_Dog_14.speaker: Scratch
CFM_Dog_14.text: Easy now. The guardian's just looking out for us.

CFM_Dog_1.speaker: Player
CFM_Dog_1.text: Did you call me guardian just now...?

CFM_Dog_30.speaker: Scratch
CFM_Dog_30.text: I... I suppose I did. You've been good to us - to both of us. Gomwick would be happy I'm with you, I think.
CFM_Dog_30.context: NodeContext: A little surprised himself (to have called the player master)

CFM_Dog_12.speaker: Owlbear Cub
CFM_Dog_12.text: Like it here. Warm fire, Scratch reminds me of big brother.
CFM_Dog_12.context: NodeContext: Content. (Sentence fragments intentional for the cub)

CFM_Dog_27.speaker: Player
CFM_Dog_27.text: Wait - did you say you have a brother?

CFM_Dog_48.speaker: Player
CFM_Dog_48.text: All right, keep it down. Folk are trying to rest.

CFM_Dog_24.speaker: Scratch
CFM_Dog_24.text: Best friends! It's nice to have company, while you're gone all day.

CFM_Dog_17.speaker: Player
CFM_Dog_17.context: InternalNodeContext: This node if the player has petted Scratch before (no companion approval)

CFM_Dog_6.speaker: Player
CFM_Dog_6.context: InternalNodeContext: This node if the player hasn't petted Scratch before (comapnion approval)

CFM_Dog_44.context: CinematicNodeContext: Scratch receives pets with enthusiasm. The cub looks up at the player expectantly.

CFM_Dog_51.speaker: Player
CFM_Dog_51.context: InternalNodeContext: This node if the player has petted the cub before (no companion approval)

CFM_Dog_38.speaker: Player
CFM_Dog_38.context: InternalNodeContext: This node if the player hasn't petted the cub before (comapnion approval)

CFM_Dog_29.context: CinematicNodeContext: Owlbear cub receives pets with a happy hoot.

CFM_Dog_20.speaker: Player
CFM_Dog_20.text: Observe the pair for any signs of injury.
CFM_Dog_20.context: InternalNodeContext: Cannot be jumped/aliased due to diffferent state from earlier version

CFM_Dog_31.speaker: Narrator
CFM_Dog_31.text: *Nothing. Both animals look fine, watching you expectantly.*
CFM_Dog_31.context: CinematicNodeContext: The player looks over the two animals (who're standing up) briefly.InternalNodeContext: Cannot be jumped/aliased due to diffferent state from earlier version

CFM_Dog_28.speaker: Player
CFM_Dog_28.text: Hold Scratch's gaze and incline your head towards the cub - everything all right?

CFM_Dog_2.speaker: Narrator
CFM_Dog_2.text: *Scratch's tail wags furiously. These two have become firm friends.*

CFM_Dog_7.speaker: Narrator
CFM_Dog_7.text: *Scratch looks at you in confusion. His tail wags enthusiastically, nonetheless.*

CFM_Dog_43.speaker: Player
CFM_Dog_43.text: Observe the pair for any signs of injury.

CFM_Dog_50.speaker: Narrator
CFM_Dog_50.context: CinematicNodeContext: The player looks over the two animals (who're lying down) briefly.

CFM_Dog_15.speaker: Player
CFM_Dog_15.text: Leave it. Those animals aren't your concern.

CFM_Dog_22.speaker: Narrator
CFM_Dog_22.text: *The sounds stop. Whatever just happened, it's too late to intervene now.*
CFM_Dog_22.context: CinematicNodeContext: The player looks out at the suddenly-quiet darkness beyond the camp.InternalNodeContext: Owlbear cub and dog placed off-stage (can't be found via gameplay for the remainder of this night).
